item.title: Introduction to jQuery
item.dc:creator: sagalbot
item.excerpt:encoded: Well, I figured it's time I started adding some posts to the blog. We're starting off with one of my favorite subjects, jQuery.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Jeff, two suggestions for this entry. First, when you talk about commenting, instead of saying " /* CSS style commenting */ " you should say " /* Block commenting */ ", just so the reader doesn't think it's for CSS only. Secondly, the script we wrote here in this tutorial is JavaScript, not jQuery. This can be proved because this, jQuery Fun! alert('Hey there!'); My first jQuery script! works as an HTML page. Just some thoughts, Owen
Thanks for the suggestions. I've made some changes to the entry.
